sentences.en: Albert had a persistent headache that lasted for three days.
sentences.cn: 艾伯特连续头痛了三天.

sentences.en: Exhaust fumes made him drowsy and brought on a headache.
sentences.cn: 废气把他熏得昏昏沉沉,还引起了头疼.

sentences.en: He has a headache and isn't feeling communicative today.
He used his headache as a pretext for not going to school.
sentences.cn: 他借口头疼而不去上学.

sentences.en: I had a headache this morning, but I'm all right now.
sentences.cn: 我今天早上头疼, 但现在好了.

sentences.en: I had the beginnings of a headache.
I often take paracetamol at work if I get a bad headache.
sentences.cn: 工作中头疼得厉害时，我常服用扑热息痛。

sentences.en: I woke up with a slight headache.
If you have a headache, you should take some aspirin.
sentences.cn: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

sentences.en: Symptoms are a slight fever, headache and loss of appetite.
sentences.cn: 症状包括低烧、头痛和食欲不振。

sentences.en: Symptoms are streaming eyes, a runny nose, headache and a cough.
sentences.cn: 症状包括流泪、流鼻涕、头痛和咳嗽。

sentences.en: The airline's biggest headache is the increase in the price of aviation fuel.
sentences.cn: 令航空公司最头疼的问题是航空燃料价格的上涨。

sentences.en: This is a real headache for us.
sentences.cn: 这对我们来说真是个难题。

sentences.en: Trying to make the children eat is a big headache.
sentences.cn: 要小孩子们吃饭是件头痛的事.

words.tran_cn: 猎头者；物色人才的人；猎取人头的蛮人
头痛的事,棘手的事,烦恼

phrases.tran_cn: 丛集性头痛；组合性头痛；头痛群

trans.tran_cn: 头痛，令人头痛的事，棘手的事，难题
